You know, a planet capturing system isn't a bad idea, but it does belong in another thread.

Okay so who wants to do an ocean battle in the great big crater halfway around the Kerbin from KSC?

Okay so who wants to do an ocean battle in the great big crater halfway around the Kerbin from KSC?

I would if I had ocean ships
we would need mods to really do that... but since some people here a purists ....

we would need mods to really do that... but since some people here a purists ....

Edit: derp

No you don't need mods. I have built several ocean ships in vanilla parts.
You don't need mods for anything really, unless said thing is added by the mod, E.G., Kethane.
but very very hard(to do right)
Not really.

but very very hard(to do right)

What's hard is making something that /doesn't/ float.

make it out of fuel cans and it will sink.

So I saw that one of the things that they are going to work on is mineable resources do you think they should use Kethane or call it something else. If they do do Kethane they should give it an atomic symbol. like Kt2 or something.

Edited October 24, 2013 by camulus777

make it out of fuel cans and it will sink.

You have to use rocket fuel.

The weight of a part is the same as its density, so rocket fuel (which floats in real life) will sink, but solid metal air intakes can be used as pontoons.
What about a system where your company gains a certain amount of "Victory Points" for each "Turn" passed while they remain in "Control" of an Easter Egg?

If you're willing to moderate that...

Like I said Axes and Allies.

Maybe we should do it on another forum and like it here.

Like I said Axes and Allies.

Maybe we should do it on another forum and like it here.

Linking to RP is disallowed, so no RP in it if you link it.
camulus how is the new video coming

its coming i have to add the rest of the music.

And no I'm not thinking of linking RP however to disallow a link is kind of odd. What is with the excessive control. It's a bit totalitarian. Leaves a bad taste in my mouth to say the least. But now i Suggested another forum for convenience and less restriction on what can be said and done. It is as if competition and a sense of triumph are frowned upon these days. You can run a conquest associated game without RP just simply stay out of character and remember it is a game.

Alright, linking to things is a bit far for my tastes, I don't much like RP and thus it didn't bother me when I learned it was illegal, but control on that level is going too far.

Edited October 24, 2013 by Shadow Lane
